document.full_text: china announced a new state internet information office on wednesday to unify the squabbling agencies that oversee the chinese internet, which beijing views as both a potential gold mine and a political threat.
document.title: china sets up agency to tighten grip on internet
lines_and_colors: china announced a new state internet information office on wednesday to unify the squabbling agencies that oversee the chinese internet, which beijing views as both a potential gold mine and a political threat.
